connect_project.error_fetching_resources: حدث خطأ أثناء جلب مصادر مكتبة الكتاب المقدس الرقمية. ستتمكن فقط من اختيار المشاريع.
connect_project.paratext_account_linked_to_another_user: لقد قمت بتسجيل الدخول إلى حساب Paratext المرتبط مسبقاً بمستخدم من خلال البريد الإلكتروني {{ email }}. سيتم تسجيل الخروج من حسابك الحالي لتستمرّ كمستخدم Paratext.
connect_project.problem_already_connected: المشروع متصل أصلاً. ربما مدير مشروع آخر قام بربط المشروع في نفس الوقت. يُرجى المحاولة مرة أخرى. إذا استمرت المشكلة، فيُرجى الإبلاغ عن المشكلة حتى نتمكن من إصلاحها.
connect_project.select_project_or_resource: حدد مشروع Paratext أو مصدر من مكتبة الكتاب المُقدَّس الرقمية يعتمد عليه مشروعك. إذا كان مشروعك مبني على مشروع Paratext ، فالأفضل إعداده كمشروع تابع في Paratext.

delete_project_dialog.please_type_project_name: يُردى طباعة اسم المشروع من أجل التأكيد.

draft_generation.back_translation_requirement: Back translation drafts can only be generated into the roughly 200 [link:supportedLanguagesUrl]supported languages[/link].
draft_generation.criteria_project_language_not_in_nllb_wi: Your project language of [em]"{{ targetLanguageDisplayName }}"[/em] is not a supported language.
draft_generation.dialog_confirm_draft_cancellation_messag: Canceling will reset progress for this draft request. Drafts that are already available for preview will still be accessible.
draft_generation.dialog_confirm_draft_regeneration_messag: Creating a new draft will delete the existing draft.
draft_generation.dialog_confirm_draft_regeneration_title: Are you done with the current draft?
draft_generation.draft_active_detail: Generating draft; this usually takes at least {{ count }} hours.
draft_generation.draft_already_running: Draft generation has already been requested for this project. Wait until the current job finishes to start a new draft.
draft_generation.draft_finishing_detail: Your draft is being finalized and saved.
draft_generation.draft_syncing_detail: Your project is being synced before queuing the draft.
draft_generation.draft_queued_detail_multiple: The translation draft generation is number {{ count }} in the queue, and will begin once the server is finished with other projects. Please check back later.
draft_generation.draft_queued_detail: Generation of the translation draft has been queued, and will begin once the server is finished with another project. Please check back later.
draft_generation.draft_queued_multiple: This draft is number {{ count }} in the queue
draft_generation.info_alert_last_sync_failed: Your project failed to synchronize. It will be synchronized when you next generate a draft.
draft_generation.info_alert_no_source_access: You do not have access to the translation source project {{ name }}. Please contact your Paratext Administrator for access, then [link:connectProjectUrl]connect to this project[/link] before you can generate a draft.
draft_generation.info_alert_no_training_source_access: You do not have access to the training source project {{ name }}. Please contact your Paratext Administrator for access, then [link:connectProjectUrl]connect to this project[/link] before you can generate a draft.
draft_generation.info_alert_download_error: There was a problem downloading your draft. Please check your Internet connection and try again in several minutes.
draft_generation.info_alert_no_additional_training_source: You do not have access to the additional training source project {{ name }}. Please contact your Paratext Administrator for access, then [link:connectProjectUrl]connect to this project[/link] before you can generate a draft.
draft_generation.info_alert_please_have_admin_configure_s: Please have a project administrator configure the draft sources. Then you will be able to generate drafts.
draft_generation.instructions_draft_process: Generating a draft usually takes at least {{ count }} hours.
draft_generation.instructions_draft_process_subtext: It can take much longer when the system is busy.
draft_generation.instructions_help: For more information, { 1 } see the help site{ 2 }.
draft_generation.instructions_keep_in_mind_subtext: You will need to edit the draft that is generated after adding it to your project.
draft_generation.instructions_scripture_forge_assist_back: Scripture Forge can assist with drafting a back translation.

If your team has already drafted one or more books and then back translated one or more of them, Scripture Forge can use the back translated books to generate a draft of the next book you are working on.
draft_generation.instructions_scripture_forge_assist_forw: Scripture Forge can assist with drafting a translation.
Based on your existing translation progress you can use the books you have already translated to generate a draft of the next book you are working on.
draft_generation.offline_message: Draft generation is not available when offline.
draft_generation.preview_last_draft_detail: The last draft build did not complete, but you can still view the most recent successful draft.
draft_generation.warning_generation_faulted: Last generation attempt failed. Click [em]"{{ generateButtonText }}"[/em] below to try again.
draft_generation.click_book_to_preview: Click a book below to preview the draft and add it to your project.

draft_generation_steps.books_are_hidden_show_why: {{ numBooks }} books are hidden. {{ underlineStart }}Show why{{ underlineEnd }}

draft_generation_steps.summary_translate: The language model will then translate these books:

draft_generation_steps.use_echo_warning: Enabling this will echo your source text instead of translating it.

draft_sources.discard_changes_confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave the page with unsaved changes?

draft_sources.project_always_used: Your project ({{ currentProjectShortName }}) will always be used to train the language model.
draft_sources.select_at_least_one_reference: Please select at least one reference project before saving.
draft_sources.select_at_least_one_source_and_reference: Please select at least one source and one reference project before saving.
draft_sources.select_at_least_one_source: Please select at least one source project before saving.
draft_sources.select_primary_reference: Select your primary reference project. This is the project that you refer to most often as you are translating.
draft_sources.some_projects_use_back_translation: Some projects get better results by adding a back translation as another reference.
draft_sources.source_side_language_codes_differ: All source and reference projects must be in the same language. Please select different source or reference projects.
draft_sources.training_files_description: Upload any further data that can be used to train the language model. These files must contain paired text in {{ sourceLanguageDisplayName }} and {{ targetLanguageDisplayName }} based on the projects selected.

draft_usfm_format.automatic_quote_style_description: Use the same quote style as the rest of the project, if possible. Recommended for most projects.
draft_usfm_format.available_for_each_draft: You can do this for every new draft if you wish.
draft_usfm_format.connect_to_the_internet: Please connect to the internet to change the draft formatting options.
draft_usfm_format.draft_format_description: The draft has been created. Here are some formatting options for the text. You can try each option to see the difference it makes.
draft_usfm_format.failed_to_save: Failed to save changes. Try again later.
draft_usfm_format.line_breaks_description: Scripture Forge translates complete verses, without line breaks, because this gives the best translation. Choose where to place the line breaks from the source.
draft_usfm_format.no_quote_convention_detected: No quote convention could be detected for your project. Straight quotes will be used in the draft regardless of which option you choose.
draft_usfm_format.option_best_guess_description: Line breaks in the source will be placed at the best guess of where they should be in the draft. Recommended for most projects.
draft_usfm_format.option_end_description: Line breaks in the source will be moved to the end of the verse.
draft_usfm_format.option_remove_description: Line breaks in the source will be omitted from the draft.
draft_usfm_format.straight_quotes_description: Use only straight quotes in the draft.

editor.no_permission_edit_chapter: You don't have permission to edit this chapter, even though you have the {{ userRole }} role. Permissions can only be changed in Paratext.

editor.project_text_not_editable: النص في هذا المشروع غير قابل للتحرير. يمكن تغيير هذا الإعداد في Paratext.
editor.text_doc_corrupted: لا يمكن تعديل أو تحرير هذا الفصل لأن البيانات أصبحت تالفة.
editor.text_has_been_deleted: تمّ حذف الكتاب أو لم يعد الوصول إليه ممكناً.
editor.to_report_issue_email: للإبلاغ عن مشكلة، أرسِل رسالة إلكترونية إلى {{ issueEmailLink }}.
editor.verse_too_long_for_suggestions: هذه الآية أطول مما ينبغي ولذا يصعب استحداث اقتراحات.

import_questions_confirmation_dialog.edited_questions_explanation: تم تعديل بعض الأسئلة التي اخترتها. هل أنت متأكد من أنك تريد تحديث الأسئلة؟ حدد الأسئلة التي تريد تحديثها.

import_questions_dialog.canceling_import_not_remove_questions: ملاحظة: الإلغاء لن يحذف الأسئلة التي تم جلبها مسبقاً.
import_questions_dialog.cannot_convert_offline: You cannot import Excel files when offline. Please connect to the internet and try again.
import_questions_dialog.csv_instructions:
إنشاء جدول بيانات فيه عمود للشاهد الكتابي وعمود للسؤال، كما يظهر أدناه: 
صدِّد أو احفظ الجدول بصيغة ملف CSV. 
انقر على {{ boldStart }}{{ importFromCsvFile }}{{ boldEnd }} في الأسفل، وحدِّد الملف.
import_questions_dialog.csv_questions_duplicates: ملاحظة: بعض الأسئلة المحددة هي نسخ دقيقة للأسئلة التي هي جزء من مشروعك. لن يتم جلبها ثانيةً.
import_questions_dialog.help_options: إن كنتَ بحاجة إلى مساعدة في أي من طرق الجلب هذه، فارفع سؤال في { 1 } موقع دعم المجتمع { 2 }، أو تواصل مع الفريق على عنوان البريد الإلكتروني{ 3 }{ 4 }.
import_questions_dialog.import_progress: جلب {{ completed }} أسئلة من بين {{ total }} أسئلة...
import_questions_dialog.invalid_csv_rows_will_be_skipped: هذه الصفوف من الملف بصيغة CSV غير صالحة، وسيتم تخطيها.
import_questions_dialog.missing_header_row: The file you imported needs to have a header row with columns titled {{ boldStart }}Reference{{ boldEnd }} and {{ boldStart }}Question{{ boldEnd }}.
import_questions_dialog.network_error_transcelerator: خطأ في الشبكة في جلب أسئلة الترجمة السريعية. إعادة المحاولة ({{ count }}).
import_questions_dialog.no_questions_available: لا توجد أسئلة للكتب/ الأسفار في هذا المشروع.
import_questions_dialog.no_transcelerator_offline: الاستيراد من الترجمة السريعة غير متوفر بدون اتصال بالإنترنت.
import_questions_dialog.question: سؤال
import_questions_dialog.transcelerator_instructions:
ترجم الأسئلة في "الترجمة السريعية" (Transcelerator).
صدِّر الأسئلة من "الترجمة السريعة" إلى "سكربتشر فورج" (Scripture Forge).
إرسال المشروع واستقباله في Paratext.
مزامنة المشروع في "سكربتشر فورج" (Scripture Forge).
انقر على {{ boldStart }}{{ importFromTranscelerator }}{{ boldEnd }} أدناه.
import_questions_dialog.transcelerator_paratext: {1} "الترجمة السريعة" (Transcelerator) {2} مُلحَق بـ{3} Paratext {4} للمساعدة في وضع وترجمة أسئلة فحص للكتاب المُقدَّس.
import_questions_dialog.transcelerator_some_questions_already_im: ملاحظة: تم جلب بعض الأسئلة المحددة قبلاً. الأسئلة التي تم تحريدها في "الترجمة السريعة" سيتم تحديدها في "سكربتشر فورج" (Scripture Forge)، وسيتم تخطي التكرارا الدقيقة.
import_questions_dialog.update_transcelerator: نسخة "الترجمة الدقيقة" (Transcelerator) المُستخدمة في هذا المشروع غير مدعومة. يُردى تحديثها إلى النسخة 1.5.3 على الأقل.

language_codes_confirmation.all_sources_must_be_same_language: All source and reference projects must be in the same language
language_codes_confirmation.change_source_projects_on_draft_sources_: Source projects can be changed on the [link:configSourcesUrl]configure draft sources page[/link]
language_codes_confirmation.confirm_lang_codes_correct: All the language codes are correct
language_codes_confirmation.contact_project_administrator_to_change_: Contact your project administrator if language settings need to be updated
language_codes_confirmation.how_to_change_language_codes: Language codes can be changed in Paratext by going to Project Settings > Project Properties > Language.
language_codes_confirmation.i_understand_and_accept: I understand the problem and want to continue anyways
language_codes_confirmation.if_unsure_contact_us: If you're not sure how to fix this problem, please contact us at {{ email }}
language_codes_confirmation.incorrect_language_codes_reduce_quality: Incorrect language codes will dramatically reduce draft quality.
language_codes_confirmation.please_make_sure_codes_correct: Before continuing, please make sure all language codes accurately represent the language of each project or resource.
language_codes_confirmation.select_different_sources: Please select different source or reference projects.
language_codes_confirmation.source_and_reference_languages_different: Source and reference projects currently have the following language codes: {{ languageCodes }}.
language_codes_confirmation.source_and_target_languages_same: Source and target languages are both {{ displayLanguage }}
language_codes_confirmation.source_and_target_projects_all_have_lang: The source and target projects all have the [b]{{ languageCode }}[/b] language code. If you are translating into a dialect or related language that does not have a separate ISO code, these settings may be correct. For all other projects, having the source and target projects set to the same language may significantly reduce the draft quality.
language_codes_confirmation.sources_in_following_languages: Currently the source projects are in the following languages:
language_codes_confirmation.sources_must_be_same_language: The training source must be the same language as the drafting source. You can update your source texts on the [link:projectSettingsUrl]settings page[/link]

question_dialog.must_be_inside_verse_range: ينبغي أن يكون ضمن نطاق الآية
question_dialog.must_be_same_book_and_chapter: ينبغي أن يكون نفس السفر والأصحاح/ الفصل
question_dialog.question: سؤال

roles.offline: Changing roles & permissions is unavailable while offline.
roles.roles_from_pt_cannot_be_changed: Roles of Paratext project members can only be changed in Paratext

role_descriptions.pt_administrator: Edit translations - manage notes and questions - manage users and settings - sync with Paratext
role_descriptions.pt_consultant: View translation - view questions & answers - add notes
role_descriptions.pt_observer: View translation - view questions & answers - view notes
role_descriptions.pt_translator: Edit translations - view questions - add answers - add notes - sync with Paratext

settings.biblical_terms_will_be_enabled: Biblical Terms will be displayed and can be updated in Scripture Forge
settings.cannot_delete_project_while_syncing: You cannot delete a project while it is syncing with Paratext. Please wait for the synchronization to complete.
settings.connect_network_to_change_settings: لا يمكن تغيير إعدادات المشروع عند عدم الاتصال بالإنترنت. الرجاء الاتصال بالإنترنت لإجراء التغييرات.
settings.delete_project_cannot_be_undone: بمجرد حذفك مشروعاً ما، لا يمكن العودة إلى الوراء. يُرجى أن تكون متأكداً.
settings.draft_settings_on_generate_page: Most translation draft generation settings are now configured from the {1}Generate draft{2} page.
settings.enable_additional_training_source: Add another source to use for training
settings.enable_alternate_source: Use a different source for drafting
settings.enable_alternate_training_source: Use a different source for training
settings.enable_translation_suggestions: لتمكين {{ boldStart }} ترجمة الاقتراحات {{ boldEnd }} ومشاهدة المزيد من الخيارات
settings.engage_the_wider_community: إشراك المجتمع الأوسع لضمان أن تكون الترجمة واضحة، ودقيقة، وطبيعية. اختر الأعداد الكتابية، واطرح أسئلة هادفة، واسمح بمناقشة الإجابات.
settings.error_fetching_projects_resources: حدث خطأ في جلب المشاريع والموارد. لا يمكنك تغيير ما يعتمد عليه المشروع.
settings.error_fetching_projects: حدثخطأ في جلب المشاريع. ستتمكن فقط من اختيار المصادر الموجودة في مكتبة الكتاب المقدس الرقمية.
settings.error_fetching_resources: حدث خطأ أثناء جلب مصادر مكتبة الكتاب المقدس الرقمية. ستتمكن فقط من اختيار المشاريع.
settings.export_checking_answers: Set which answers will be exported as comments when syncing with Paratext.
settings.pre_translation_alternate_source_info: Select a different source for drafting, if your currently selected source is not to be used for pre-translation drafting.
settings.pre_translation_alternate_training_sourc: Selecting a separate translation for training, such as a back translation, can improve drafting quality.
settings.pre_translation_additional_training_sour: Select another translation in the source language to combine with your training source
settings.pre_translation_send_all_segments_info: For these to be pre-translated, your translation structure must match your source exactly.
settings.see_others_answers_and_comments: السماح للمراجعين برؤية إجابات بعضهم البعض
settings.select_project_or_resource: حدد مشروع Paratext أو مصدر من مكتبة الكتاب المُقدَّس الرقمية يعتمد عليه مشروعك. إذا كان مشروعك مبني على مشروع Paratext ، فالأفضل إعداده كمشروع تابع في Paratext.
settings.serval_config_description: {{ boldStart }}Warning:{{ boldEnd }} The following configuration is for Serval technicians only:
settings.sharing_administrators: Allow administrators to invite any guest role
settings.sharing_community_checkers: Allow community checkers to invite community checkers
settings.sharing_description: Anyone invited to these guest roles can join the project in Scripture Forge without having a Paratext account.
settings.sharing_scripture_forge_guests_help: To learn more about these guest roles, see [link:rolesHelpUrl]the help page[/link].
settings.sharing_translators: Allow translators to invite any guest role
settings.source_projects_cannot_be_deleted: ثمّة مشروع آخر مبني على هذا المشروع، ولذا لا يمكن حذفه.
settings.translation_suggestions_require_source_t: ملاحظة: اقتراحات التَّرْجَمَة متاحة فقط إذا تم اختيار نص مصدر.
settings.translations_will_be_suggested: سيتم اقتراح ترجمات للكلمات والعبارات عند تحرير النص الكتابي استناداً إلى المشروع أو المصدر الذي تمّ اختياره أعلاه.
settings.checkers_listen_to_scripture_audio: Checkers will need to listen to Scripture audio.
settings.will_not_delete_paratext_project: هذا {{ boldStart }} لن {{ boldEnd }} يحذِف مشروع الـ Paratext الخاص بك، ولكنّه سيلغي كل البيانات غير المتزامنة المُخزنة في "سكريبتشر فورج" (Scripture Forge). يُوصى بـ {{ templateTagBoundary }} مزامنة {{ templateTagBoundary }} أولاً قبل الحذف.

editor_add_tab_resource_dialog.error_fetching_resources: حدث خطأ أثناء جلب مصادر مكتبة الكتاب المقدس الرقمية. ستتمكن فقط من اختيار المشاريع.
editor_add_tab_resource_dialog.error_loading_resource: There was an error loading the selected resource.

suggestions_settings_dialog.settings_not_available_offline: هذا الإجراء غير متوفر عندما تكون غير متصل بالإنترنت.

sync.connect_network_to_synchronize: يُرجى الاتصال بالإنترنت من أجل مزامنة هذا المشروع
sync.phase_1_percent: Checking Paratext updates to biblical terms {{progressPercent}}%
sync.phase_4: Updating books and permissions from Paratext
sync.phase_4_percent: Updating books and permissions from Paratext {{progressPercent}}%
sync.something_went_wrong_synchronizing_this_: حدث خطأ أثناء مزامنة {{ projectName }} مع Paratext. يُرجى المحاولة مرة أخرى.
sync.successfully_synchronized_with_paratext: تمت مزامنة {{ projectName }} بنجاح مع Paratext.
sync.sync_is_disabled: ينبغي تعطيل مزامنة هذا المشروع، ولذا فهي غير متاحة الآن. الرجال الاتصال بـ {{ email }} من أجل مناقشة ما ينبغي عمله ليمكن مزامنة المشروع ثانيةً.
sync.sync_failure_support_message: حدث خطأ ما في آخر مرة حاول فيها "سكريبتشر فورج" (Scripture Forge) مزامنة المشروع مع Paratext. إذا لم ينجح بعد أن تحاول مرة أخرى، يرجى إرسال تقرير عن المشكلة عن طريق الكتابة إلى {{email}}.
sync.sync_user_permissions_failure_message: The last user to synchronize this project no longer has permission to sync. Please contact the project administrator.
sync.user_permissions_failure_dialog_message: You no longer have permission to synchronize this project with Paratext. Please contact the project administrator.

training_data_multi_select.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this training data?

training_data_upload_dialog.skip_first_row: Skip first row of data file
training_data_upload_dialog.no_upload_offline: Training data cannot be uploaded without connecting to the internet.
training_data_upload_dialog.upload_failed: The training data file could not be uploaded. Please try again or use a different file.

translate_overview.cannot_train_suggestion_engine: Translation suggestions are unavailable. Please select a source project that shares books in common with this project to get translation suggestions.
translate_overview.not_enough_verses_translated: Translation suggestions are unavailable. Please ensure that there are at least 10 matching verses translated in the source and target projects.

warnings.login_cookie_deletion: Logging out will remove your ability to log back into this account. Are you sure you want to log out?
warnings.paratext_credentials_expired: Your Paratext user credentials have expired. Please log out and log back in again.
